name: Hieroglifs Romania
overview:
Hieroglifs Translations provides a full range of translation services to companies worldwide, supporting 150 languages in various combinations and expertise in translating documents focused on IT, telecommunications, software localization, commerce, advertising, public relations, law, literature, electronics, banking and finance, chemistry, engineering, music, sports, travel and tourism, fashion and more. Hieroglifs Translations takes great care to ensure quality. With access to a huge database of language experts, our project managers can quickly select the best professional for each job.

Our goal is to become a leading provider of multilingual and globalization services. We will meet that goal one client at a time by: â€¢ Understanding and fulfilling each clientâ€™s needs â€¢ Building strong business relationships â€¢ Offering the best solutions â€¢ Providing individualized attention and personal service We welcome visitors at our offices in Romania and Latvia. We are also accessible over the phone and online. Feel free to contact us with any language challenges you may have. We are dedicated to providing personal service and comprehensive language solutions.
